import React from "react"; import "../index.css"; function Main() { function handleEditAvatarClick() { document.querySelector(".avatar-popup").classList.add("popup_opened"); } function handleEditProfileClick() { document.querySelector(".profile-popup").classList.add("popup_opened"); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { document.querySelector(".new-card-popup").classList.add("popup_opened"); } window .querySelector(".profile-popup") .addEventListener("click", handleEditProfileClick); window .querySelector(".profile__add-card-button") .addEventListener("click", handleAddPlaceClick); window .querySelector(".profile__avatar") .addEventListener("click", handleEditAvatarClick); return (
